item.title: About
item.description: Hi there, I am David Li and welcome to my personal site. Drop me message below if you’d like.

IELTS Speaking Test Assistant IELTS Speaking Test Assistant - Part 1 Thanks to WebAudioRecorder.js This project is open-source at my github. Welcome to contributing the IELTS questions. Save audio file as Waveform Audio (.wav) MP3 (MPEG-1 Audio Layer III) (.mp3) Ogg Vorbis (.ogg) Next Record Stop Recordings var url = "http://btcz.im/assets/ieltspeakitq/p1.txt"; $.ajax(url).done(function(data) { var myQs = data.
